.bg-gradient
Preview 
.bg-gradient {
  background-image: linear-gradient(
    var(--quanta-gradient-direction, to right),
    var(--quanta-from-color, transparent),
    var(--quanta-to-color, transparent)
  );
}

.ring
Preview 
.ring {
  --ring-width: 0.25rem;
  --ring-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 var(--ring-width) var(--ring-color);
}
.ring-sm
Preview 
.ring-sm   { --ring-width: 0.125rem; }
.ring-md
Preview 
.ring-md   { --ring-width: 0.5rem; }
.ring-lg
Preview 
.ring-lg   { --ring-width: 1rem; }
.ring-inset
Preview
